logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
commit build patch by josias. it attempts to work around an xslt transformer bug under windows, which prevents a build on windows. see http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=40113
windows users, please review. this should now work for both jdk 1.4 and 1.5+...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: brown paper bag commit - forgot josias' additional xsl...

logentry.author: jann
logentry.msg: fixes http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42863

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
fixes bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42846 for bxe. this is just an example fix to show where the problem lies. the correct solution for all editors is to factor the stuff out into a separate usecase.
removes all occurrences of $contextprefix from sitemap and xslt, since this concept is now obsolete thanks to the proxy transformer.

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: [minor] changed mime-type to text/javascript so svn diff will work

logentry.author: rfrovarp
logentry.msg: Fixes so that the separator is only inserted if the node being checked is visible. Prevents ugly extra spaces from invisible nodes. This fixes bug 42890

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Updated link to meta stylesheets wiki page, see bug 42882.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: introduce a session role into the default publication. everybody (aka <world/>) gets the session role in authoring/. it allows access to ac.login (not really, since it is sneaked past the authorizer), ac.logout and admin.aboutLenya. all these should be available to everyone, always. evil-minded people can still remove them via the admin gui, but they get what they deserve.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed unused asset.xsl

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed another, totally unrelated, but equally unused asset.xsl from the core.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: change "insert after" to "insert" as mentioned in bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42887 besides being more intuitive, it saves screen real estate. thanks to michael trindler for spotting.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: introduced generic editors.insertLink usecase implementation. the view is created by a cocoon pipeline, not a jxtemplate, because the necessary data is more readily available as input modules than via the java api. the next commit will migrate tinymce to use this implementation.

logentry.msg: tinymce now uses the generic editors.insertLink usecase.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
added tinymce localisation according to {request:locale}. quite awkward, since it requires an extra pipeline and transformation, but there is no way to determine the browser language settings via javascript :( removed "lenya.editorModule" parameter, callbacks are now provided by the parent window and accessed via window.opener, i.e. the generic usecase no longer needs to know which module is calling.
this is work in progress.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Paste usecase: Don't lock nodes if clipboard is empty. See bug 42960.

logentry.author: rfrovarp
logentry.msg: Fixes NPE problem when trying to select the authoring node.

logentry.author: rfrovarp

logentry.msg: Last changes to prevent NPEs when selecting authoring node under site tab.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: simplified tinymce localisation code (folded into page2edit.xsl transform, gets rid of extra javascript transform).

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: tinymce doc update.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: updated module version. re-activated auto resize feature. whitenoise and some comments added to config.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: pass on xml comments (we used to eat those). thanks to phillip green for the patch!

logentry.msg: renamed usecase-edit.xconf to usecase-publicationEdit.xconf for consistency. no functional changes.

logentry.msg: Updated test (blog publication removed)

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: re-activate the "reformat" button in oneform. this was fixed a while ago, but somehow we forgot to enable it (see http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42237)

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed obsolete files

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added javascript helpers for new generic editor usecases. org.apache.lenya.editors.js is kinda the new api between generic usecases and the editor modules. work in progress, not active yet (need to port bxe first..)

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: add declarations for new generic editor usecases. insert[Asset|Image] won't work yet without patching insertAsset.jx, but this can only happen after bxe is ported...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: mostly whitenoise.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: forgot to svn add those...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added editors.createResource usecase (re-uses the code of resource.Create, but menu turned off). turned off continuations for insertFoo usecases, as they have just one step and no server-side effects.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: updated javascript API. objectData is now a proper object with a prototype. minor usecase handler fixes + some whitenoise.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: contentSnippet is now also a proper object. documentation, code formatting

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Adding check for className parameter to AddUser usecase

logentry.msg: Refactoring: extracted method

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Fixed proxy tests (don't include GlobalProxies test)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Refactoring in InsertAsset usecase, added error message display to inserAsset and insertLink JX templates

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Use lenya.asset instead of asset for asset <a> CSS class. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for the suggestion.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
new generic usecase API for editors. see modules/editors/resources/javascript/org.apache.lenya.editors.js for documentation. adds generic insertLink and insertAsset/Image usecases with infrastructure. enhanced oneform editor, it uses external usecases now.
this will break external usecase support in all editors.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: migrate bxe to new generic editor usecases. delete old editor-specific usecases

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: migrate tinymce to new generic editor usecase api. delete obsolete local usecases

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: migrate fckeditor to new editor usecase api. this is a little shaky atm...

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] code cleanup, formatting

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added readme note about editor usecase changes added editors.* usecase policies to default pub added tinymce and fckeditor usecase policies to default pub

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added ConcurrentModificationException, improved session and usecase error handling

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added "cancel" button to resource.create usecase

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: some IE-related fixes: use correct window name without dashes, focus window after opening.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: fixed syntax error in config file, reverted unnecessary change in simplebrowser plugin.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: fixed "cancel" behaviour of insertLink. thanks to richard for spotting!

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed debugging statement

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: changed asset marker class from "asset" to "lenya.asset" to comply with http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&rev=560238.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: changed usecase strings to symbolic constants. no functional change.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
deleted obsolete download hint (bxe is shipped with trunk). deleted obsolete javascript helpers for old usecases.
-- This line, and those below, will be ignored--
D bxe/resources/javascript/insertAsset.js D bxe/resources/javascript/insertLink.js D bxe/resources/misc/download.xhtml

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: whitenoise, deactivated debug messages

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
fixed broken asset insertion. the usecase incorrectly used a path-based uri instead of an uuid-based one, which broke the "documentLink" format of the resources module. changed asset wrapper from

to , because spans are correct almost everywhere, whereas

s cannot be contained in

s or inline elements.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed obsolete files related to old asset upload mechanism

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: deleted obsolete usecase declarations

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
disable rollback buttons when the workflow event cannot be invoked this fixes http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42973.
can somebody with insight into our workflowables please review the java part?
one issue: in order to produce meaningful error messages, the view now has knowledge about the "review" state... which is a little sad since otherwise workflow transitions are fully configurable per publication. solutions welcome.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added forgotton commit that prevented rollback buttons from working whitenoise

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Updated revision controller test to API change

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: updated protocols documentation. marked lenyadoc: as deprecated in favour of lenya-protocol:. please review for correctness.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added additional lenya-document: protocol page to site tree. i just made stuff up... please check if this is correct.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Refactored SourceNodeRCML (replaced XPathAPI with NamespaceHelper), using class lock to avoid ConcurrentModificationException.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: fix syntax error.

logentry.author: rfrovarp
logentry.msg: New disable backspace code that registers itself merely by being loaded. Change FCK usecase to try to register itself as an event to onload. This would allow for multiple onload's to happen if necessary in the future.

logentry.author: rfrovarp
logentry.msg: Load custom config file from publication, as many may want to override the default. Also removed a bad glue import that was changed to a plugin.
